default.title_faceA: Tap the card to reply to an question
default.endtitle_A: We’ll see if your friends know you well!

question_1.question: What capital would you like to visit?

question_3.question: Can you picture yourself exploring the jungle?
question_3.a: No, I'd prefer staying at an hotel

question_4.question: Do you like to go on a roadtrip?
question_4.b: I can’t handle that much car travel

question_5.question: Which country do you absolutely want to visit?

question_6.question: Do you like camping?
question_6.a: Not too much, I’m afraid of wild animals

question_7.question: Do you see yourself doing moutain biking?
question_7.a: I don’t like to ride the bike

question_1.question: Which capital would like to visit [partenaireName]?
